channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] watsonx.governance (aiopenscale) has changed the description of the plan named essentials
item.description:
*before*: The watsonx.governance Essentials plan enables organizations to monitor AI Models for quality, health, and trust metrics; explanations and what-if analysis, and automatically document model metadata with custom use cases., *after*: The watsonx.governance Essentials plan enables organizations to monitor AI Models for quality, health, and trust metrics; explanations and what-if analysis, and automatically document model metadata with custom use cases.
A paid instance of a supported database (Databases for PostgreSQL, Db2 or Db2 warehouse) must be used.

item.title: [updated] watsonx.governance (aiopenscale) has changed the description of the plan named lite
item.description:
*before*: The watsonx.governance Lite Plan offers everything you need to begin your journey to governing AI models across your business, including access to explanations, bias detection and mitigation, and automated AI capabilities.
Internal Postgres db instance that supports the above capacity; Data cannot be migrated from this instance; If upgrading to Essentials plan and continuity is required from Lite plan, please provision your own paid instances of supported databases from IBM Cloud Catalog, *after*: The watsonx.governance Lite Plan offers everything you need to begin your journey to governing AI models across your business, including access to explanations, bias detection and mitigation, and automated AI capabilities.
- The Lite plan includes a free internal PostgreSQL database instance with a maximum size of 100 MB.
- The instance is hosted and not directly accessible. - Data in this database cannot be migrated and is lost if the instance is reconfigured. - The internal database is not GDPR compliant. - For workloads that process personally identifiable information (PII), or when upgrading from the Lite plan to the Essentials plan with continuity requirements, a paid instance of a supported database from the IBM Cloud catalog must be used.

item.title: [updated] Cloud Reservations for VPC (is.reservation) was made available in the Chennai catalog
[updated] Db2 Warehouse (dashdb) was made available in the London catalog
[updated] Partner with Technology Expert Labs (consult-with-icg-wes) has removed the plan named tels-build-storagepro
[updated] Storage Ceph as a Service (software-defined-storage) has changed the description of the plan named capacity
item.description: *before*: S3 Object Storage Flash & HDD disks <20ms latency Perfect for Archive, Backup and Deep Data Lakes , *after*: S3 Object Storage Flash & HDD disks <20ms latency Perfect for Archive, Backup and Deep Data Lakes

item.title: [updated] Storage Ceph as a Service (software-defined-storage) has changed the description of the plan named performance
item.description: *before*: Block and S3 Object Storage All NVME Disks 4k IOPS/TiB at < 2ms latency VMware Ready , *after*: Block and S3 Object Storage All NVME Disks 4k IOPS/TiB at < 2ms latency VMware Ready

item.title: [updated] watsonx Code Assistant (code-assistant) has a new plan named standard-z
item.description: The Standard plan for IBM watsonx Code Assistant for Z as a Service provides everything you need to understand your application, explain & generate Code

item.title: [added] CORIZANCE AML Screening (corizance-aml-screening)
item.description: Automated AML screening against global sanctions and PEP lists to help detect financial crime and ensure compliance

item.title: [added] PROFI VCFcomplete Service (profi-vcfcomplete-service)
item.description: PROFI Services for building your environment around VCF (VMware by Broadcom) in the IBM Cloud

item.title: [updated] Bare Metal Servers for VPC (is.bare-metal-server) has removed the plan named gx3d-metal-224x2048x8mi300x
[updated] Load Balancer for VPC (is.load-balancer) has a new plan named distributed-network-load-balancer-gen2-sdn
item.description: Network Load Balancer for VPC (SDN). Pricing will cover Distributed Network Load Balancer and Service Distributed Network Load Balancer.
